meanings.definition: The quality or state of being bizarre or strange.
meanings.sent1: The bizarrenesses of the movie plot left the audience puzzled.
meanings.sent2: She was fascinated by the bizarrenesses of the modern art exhibit.
meanings.sent3: The bizarrenesses of the situation made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were filled with bizarrenesses that seemed to come from another world.
meanings.sent5: The bizarrenesses of the carnival attractions made it a memorable experience.

meanings.definition: The bizarre or strange aspects or qualities of something.
meanings.sent1: The bizarrenesses in the painting caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: Exploring the old house revealed many hidden bizarrenesses.
meanings.sent3: The bizarrenesses of the fashion show made the models look like aliens.
meanings.sent4: The bizarrenesses of the forest at night gave it an eerie feel.
meanings.sent5: She captured the bizarrenesses of the city in her photography.
